attributes.action: A bill to ensure that defecting MP's resign, triggering an automatic byelection
attributes.additional_details:
Because at the moment, any MP can just walk across the chamber to another party that their constituents did not want to elect  which flies in the face of democracy!
And if Parliament has time to waste on discussing whether someone had a drink at a socially distanced small wwlcome back to work surprise gathering outside on Crown Estate land not covered by any Covid laws, then they can make time to debate defections!
attributes.background: To pass a bill to make defectors to other parties resign, triggering an automatic byelection in their Constituencies.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Mandatory by-election for MPs who resign from their party or lose the whip: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606743
